title: Life is short
creator_credit: United Nations, Unesco and Stephen Hearst
brief_description: Contrasts the surplus in rich lands, with the chronic malnutritian and near-starvation in the poor. Relates U.N. family efforts to assure a basic and healthy diet for all; and the problem of production, distribution and social adjustment involved; the “Freedom from Hunger” campaign. U Thant tells of the urgency and the target involved in the U. N.’s Development Decade.
